name: Home Is Dead
description:
This was made for ludum dare 39.  The theme was 'running out of power'.

This is my first ever completed solo game!  I hope you enjoy it.

The goal is to defend the space station from aliens that will suck the power away from the station.  The threat starts small and grows over the course of the game.

Try to hold out as long as possible and get a high score!

this project was made with godot
